values:
i have the biggest crush on a sixteen year old.

thats all thats new. 
its not really that new, ive had a crush on him since last year.. 
we just recently started talking (well, for about three months now).

im aliiiive updates: i broke up with that boy. he was way too possessive for me. i did take him to prom -- that was the worst. oh yeah --
i graduated last tuesday, the day after memorial day.
i chose my college. ill be starting temple in august or september (im not exactly sure when). im excited though, and kind of scared. im going to be broke forever! i really do miss my lj. i should update more often

im the only one in my school to get accepted to drexel university! holy shit too bad i want to go to temple university :\ i got a boyfriend now, too bad i want to break it off (cause i just cant settle down yet)

so im a little late updating about it, oh well. it was fun. i was all in the spirit for some reason, even though i didnt have a valentine. my outfit was valentinesy, but not.. at the same time. the pictures explain it better than i can.

i asked one girl at my job if i could work for her because i knew she had a boyfriend and i didnt have anything better to do.. plus, i needed money. i worked with shakira anyway so we had fun. stephanie got me this cute card. iloveit! she didnt want to seem gay, so she didnt sign it, which is gay, but whatever. if you dont get it.. my last name is squirrel. :D
tonight im supposed to be going on a triple date, after the basketball game. ive seen the boy that im supposed to be going with but hes never seen me. wish me luck. i think we're going to the movies (i dont know what we're seeing yet), then out to eat afterwards. ill probably buy an outfit while im out buying my sisters birthday present. her boyfriend is throwing a surprise party for her at the 40/40 club in atlantic city tomorrow night. i cant go though, you have to be 21 to get in. i cried :( dotdot, email me jerk! whered dijah go? edit: the date was canceled (but the boys were at the game). we won the game! i looked really cute tonight but my sister has the camera :(

snow day! i dont exactly understand why we're having a snow day because the snow stopped saturday night/sunday morning. i really could have sworn we had school today, to the point where i showered, got dressed and waited at the busstop. i was actually up there thinking i might have even missed it (since i never ride it, im not sure what time it comes). nobody hit me up last night or this morning to inform me. hmph
im still alive! i got the flu on wednesday and have been sick ever since. womp womp. im recovering though, i fought through it like a g :)
